PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-04771999-03-180,  ,  ,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 1998-2123 of December 1, 1998 which will change the name of the firm of accountants RAYMOND, CHABOT, MARTIN, PARÉ, to RAYMOND CHABOT GRANT THORNTON to audit the affairs and to perform the annual audits of the Bank of Canada for the five fiscal years 1999 through 2003.
Attachments
precis:
Amendment to Order in Council P.C. 1998-2123 of December 1, 1998 which
will change the name of the firm of accountants RAYMOND, CHABOT, MARTIN,
PARÉ, to RAYMOND CHABOT GRANT THORNTON to audit the affairs and to
perform the annual audits of the Bank of Canada for the five fiscal years
1999 through 2003.
